column2: Functions recursively assigning properties on objects may be the cause of accidental modification of a built-in prototype object.
column4: Properties are copied from [["src"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-915/examples/PrototypePollutingFunction.js:2:21:2:23"]] to [["dst"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-915/examples/PrototypePollutingFunction.js:7:13:7:15"]] without guarding against prototype pollution.
